overview: From 2026-01-30 to 2026-01-31, elizaos-plugins/plugin-n8n-workflow had 3 new PRs (3 merged), 0 new issues, and 2 active contributors.

topPRs.title: fix: workflow actions reliability + credential injection + cloud integration
topPRs.author: standujar
topPRs.body:
## Summary
- **Fix credential injection**: fuzzy Api suffix matching in credentialResolver + correct LLM prompt examples (`gmailOAuth2Api` → `gmailOAuth2`)
- **Fix intent classification**: language-agnostic structural rules instead of keyword-based matching — short confirmations like "creer le" no longer misclassify as "new"
- **Fix DELETE/ACTIVATE/DEACTIVATE**: fetch workflows directly from service instead of relying on `state.data.workflows` (provider data not reliably merged into state by ElizaOS)
- **Fix settings access**: use `runtime.character.settings.workflows` instead of `runtime.getSetting()` which only returns primitives
- **Auto-activate workflows** after deployment via `POST /workflows/{id}/activate`
- **Remove LIST_N8N_WORKFLOWS action**: `activeWorkflowsProvider` already injects workflow list into LLM context (bootstrap plugin pattern)
- **Add safety net** in CREATE "new" path: restore draft if generation fails
- **Rename settings key** from `n8n` to `workflows`
- **Update node catalog** via new `crawl-nodes` script
- **Cloud bridge credential_data flow**: plugin creates n8n credentials from OAuth tokens/API keys provided by cloud bridge, caches mapping in credential store
- **Integration availability check** (spec 09): three-tier pre-generation check — immediate block when no service nodes remain, LLM feasibility assessment when partial coverage exists, proceed when all integrations are available. Prevents generating workflows the platform can't run
- **Conversation context preservation**: `buildConversationContext` passes last 5 messages to generation, preventing context loss after errors or multi-turn interactions
- **Constrain generation to catalog**: LLM prompt now enforces strict usage of provided node types only

## Test plan
- [x] 159 tests pass (unit, integration, E2E)
- [ ] Live test: create workflow → verify credentials injected + auto-activated
- [ ] Live test: delete workflow by ID or name
- [ ] Live test: confirm short messages ("go", "oui") classify as confirm, not new
- [ ] Live test: create workflow with unsupported integrations → UNSUPPORTED_INTEGRATION response
- [ ] Live test: create workflow with partially supported integrations → feasibility check proceeds or blocks
- [ ] Live test: confirm draft with missing credentials → AUTH_REQUIRED with auth URLs

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

## Release Notes

* **New Features**
  * Workflow modification: modify existing drafts without full regeneration
  * Execution history: view workflow run history and status details
  * Enhanced credential handling: automatic detection and authentication flow for missing credentials
  * Improved workflow matching: identify workflows by name or semantic description

* **Bug Fixes**
  * Draft lifecycle management and recovery after generation failures
  * Credential resolution priority and caching
  * Workflow matching accuracy

* **Documentation**
  * Comprehensive architecture and specification guide
  * Updated prompts for better intent classification supporting multiple languages

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

topPRs.title: feat: draft/preview/confirm flow + credential store + deslop
topPRs.author: standujar
topPRs.body:
## Summary

- **Draft/preview/confirm flow** for `CREATE_N8N_WORKFLOW`: replaces one-shot deploy with a cached state machine (generate → preview → confirm/modify/cancel → deploy)
- **LLM-driven intent classification** via `classifyDraftIntent()` — no static keyword matching for confirm/cancel/modify detection
- **LLM-driven clarification** when the user request is vague (`_meta.requiresClarification`)
- **N8nCredentialStore** service: DB-backed credential mapping per user, with interface-based design for cloud override
- **Service split**: `generateWorkflowDraft()` + `deployWorkflow()` replace the old one-shot `createWorkflowFromPrompt()`
- **Deslop pass**: removed all dead code (6 unused types, `executeWorkflow` action, `validateWorkflowOrThrow`, redundant default exports), replaced `as any` with typed casts, cleaned up comments

## Changes

### New files
- `src/prompts/draftIntent.ts` — LLM prompt for intent classification
- `src/schemas/draftIntent.ts` — JSON schema for intent output
- `src/services/n8n-credential-store.ts` — DB-backed credential store
- `src/db/schema.ts` — Drizzle schema for credential mappings

### Modified
- `src/actions/createWorkflow.ts` — full rewrite with draft/preview/confirm state machine
- `src/services/n8n-workflow-service.ts` — split into `generateWorkflowDraft()` + `deployWorkflow()`
- `src/utils/generation.ts` — added `classifyDraftIntent()`, simplified casts
- `src/types/index.ts` — added `WorkflowDraft`, `DraftIntentResult`; removed 6 dead types
- `src/prompts/workflowGeneration.ts` — strengthened clarification instructions

### Removed
- `src/actions/executeWorkflow.ts` — dead code
- `validateWorkflowOrThrow()` — unused in production
- `createWorkflowFromPrompt()` — replaced by split methods
- All redundant `export default` statements

## Test plan

- [x] 153 tests passing (unit + integration + e2e)
- [x] Build clean (`tsc` — zero errors)
- [x] Zero `as any` in production code
- [ ] Manual test: generate workflow draft → preview → confirm deploy
- [ ] Manual test: generate draft → modify → re-preview → confirm
- [ ] Manual test: generate draft → cancel

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **New Features**
  * Draft-based workflow creation with preview, clarifications, regenerate/modify flows, confirm-to-deploy path, intent classification for drafts, and TTL-based draft caching; richer deploy responses including missing-credential details.

* **Bug Fixes**
  * Improved payload sanitization and validation; clearer deployment/error messaging.

* **Removed**
  * Standalone workflow execution action removed (execution now via confirm/deploy flow).

* **Refactor**
  * Streamlined generation → preview → deploy lifecycle and simplified action/export surface.

* **Tests**
  * Expanded integration/unit tests and updated test helpers/mocks.

<sub>✏️ Tip: You can customize this high-level summary in your review settings.</sub>
<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **New Features**
  * Added support for pending workflow drafts awaiting user confirmation or modification.
  * Enhanced workflow creation with additional example scenarios for confirmations and cancellations.

* **Tests**
  * Added test coverage for pending draft functionality, including cache handling and expiry validation.

* **Chores**
  * Bumped version to 1.0.6.

topContributors.summary: BaseGold: Focused on feature development, successfully implementing a StreamableHTTP transport and custom headers in elizaos-plugins/plugin-mcp via PR #20, which involved modifying 2 files with a net addition of 10 lines of code.

borisudovicic: Focused on strategic planning and project initiation, creating four new issues to outline key initiatives including a "Monday Launch - Eliza App MVP" (elizaos/eliza#6440), a "Marketing AI Agency Takeover Campaign" (elizaos/eliza#6439), a "Privy Plugin & Integration" (elizaos/eliza#6438), and an "OAuth Provider Rollout" (elizaos/eliza#6437).
